title: Manhunt - [PS3] (PS2 classics) 4.21+
description:
Manhunt converted into a ps2 classic for ps3.

Within contains the manhunt pkg file, the .rap in the exdata folser, reactpsn 2.26, and instruction.

Works with Rebug 4.41+ and Rogero 4.41+.


To Install.

If you already have a custom ps2 classics installed
and running on your ps3 then all you have to do is
install and play.

If you don't, here's how to install and get the custom pkg working.

1. Install manhunt and reactpsn.(Unless of course you already have reactpsn)

2. Place "exdata" folder on flash drive.

3. Put flash drive in the right usb port.

4. Create a new user and name it "aa".

5. Run reactpsn and do not press any buttons. (ps3 should do a soft reboot)

6. Play the game!
